ActivityMetadata.Name: ZM Get Users IM Messages
ActivityMetadata.Label: ZM Get Users IM Messages
ActivityMetadata.Description: Get IM Chat messages for a specified period of time. Note: This API only supports Oauth2. **Scopes:** `imchat:read` API End of Life: This API will no longer be supported after April, 2020. Learn more.
ActivityMetadata.HelpHtml:
# Zoom

Get Userâ€™s IM Messages

Get IM Chat messages for a specified period of time. Note: This API only supports Oauth2. **Scopes:** `imchat:read` API End of Life: This API will no longer be supported after April, 2020. Learn more.

Method: Get

OperationID: listimmessages

EndPoint:

/im/users/{userId}/chat/messages
